DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective clinical trial compare growth infant ( express weight gain g/day ) consume new Amino Acid Formula infant consume commercially available hypoallergenic formula period 4 month .
DOC.brief_title: Growth Infants Fed Amino Acid Infant Formula
DOC.criteria: Healthy newborn infant Fullterm ( > = 37 week gestation ) Birth weight > = 2500 < =4500 g 017 day age enrolment ( day 0 day birth ) Infant 's mother elect breastfeed exclusively formulafeed infant Study explain write information provide Caregiver demonstrate understand give information Informed consent sign ( parent/legal representative ) Congenital illness malformation may affect infant feed and/or normal growth Suspected know allergy cow 's milk protein Significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease Any readmission hospital ( except hyperbilirubinemia ) prior enrolment Infant receive prescription medication ( exception topical antibiotic and/or treatment thrush ) frequent use counter medication except vitamin mineral supplement Infant currently participate another conflict clinical study Infant 's family Investigator 's assessment expect comply protocol
